whyAiSpa.description: I explain in simple terms why Single Page Applications built with React using individual approach is the best choice for your business.

benefit1.title: React = reliability and popularity
benefit1.description: React is the most popular library for web development, used by Facebook, Netflix, Airbnb. Your website will be stable, fast and easy to maintain.

benefit2.title: SPA = mobile app speed
benefit2.description: Single Page Application loads once and then works like a mobile app. Instant navigation, no reloads - users stay on the site longer.

benefit3.title: Supabase = powerful backend
benefit3.description: I use Supabase to create a powerful backend with database, authentication, and API. Your site is ready to scale without additional costs.

benefit4.title: Marketing according to your needs
benefit4.description: Google Ads, Facebook Ads, Instagram Ads, Analytics, Tag Manager, Search Console - I set up only what your business and budget need.

benefit5.title: Analytics for your business
benefit5.description: I set up only the metrics important for your business: where customers come from, what interests them, how much they spend, ROI of each channel.

benefit6.title: Individual approach
benefit6.description: I work with each client separately to understand business needs and create exactly the solution that will bring maximum results.

faq.description: Answers to the most common questions about creating SPA websites with React using individual approach and marketing tools.
faq.question1: What is SPA and why is it better than regular website?
faq.answer1: SPA (Single Page Application) is a website that loads once and then works like a mobile app. Instead of reloading the entire page on transitions, only content changes. Result: speed, better UX, higher conversion, longer time on site.
faq.question2: How long does it take to create a SPA website?
faq.answer2: Depends on project complexity. Simple landing page - 3-5 days, corporate website - 7-10 days, online store - 2-3 weeks. React allows quick creation of quality components, and Supabase provides ready backend.
faq.question3: What is included in the base price from $300?
faq.answer3: Base price includes: React SPA development, responsive design, basic SEO, hosting for a year. Marketing tools (Google Ads, Facebook Ads, Analytics etc.) are set up additionally as needed.
faq.question4: What marketing tools can you set up?
faq.answer4: I can set up: Google Ads, Facebook Ads, Instagram Ads, Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, Google Search Console, Facebook Pixel. I discuss with each client which tools are needed specifically for their business.
faq.question5: Why did you choose React specifically?
faq.answer5: React is the most popular and stable library for web development. It's used by Facebook, Netflix, Airbnb, Uber. Huge community, constant updates, countless ready solutions. Your website will be reliable and easy to maintain.
faq.answer6: React ensures high code reliability thanks to component architecture. Supabase guarantees 99.9% uptime. Your website will work stably even under high loads.
faq.question7: Will I be able to add content myself?
faq.answer7: Yes! I'll set up a convenient admin panel through Supabase or teach you to work with code. React components are easy to edit. First changes are free, then we can agree on subscription maintenance.
faq.question8: How does SEO work for SPA?
faq.answer8: I use Server-Side Rendering and proper meta tag structure. Set up Google Search Console for position tracking. SPAs can rank just as well as regular websites with the right approach.
faq.question9: What to do after website launch?
faq.answer9: I'll help with setting up chosen marketing tools. Provide instructions for working with admin panel and optimization recommendations for better results. Support is discussed individually.
